sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.bsm_map_keylines" name="Keylines Business Service Maps" state="published" type="application" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow">
<description>An interactive and graphical interface to visualize Configuration Items (CIs) and their relationships. Provides filtering capabilities to manage data being displayed, allowing for configuration by the user to view in context to their role. Additional capabilities provide for the displaying of related tasks such as Incidents, Problems, Changes and Certification Tasks.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.diagrammer"/> <import plugin="com.snc.keylines"/> <!-- Make sure the old BSM plugin is loaded BEFORE this plugin --> <import plugin="com.glideapp.bsm_map2"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="KeylinesMap" class="com.snc.keylines_bsm_map.KeylinesProcessor"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>An interactive and graphical interface to visualize Configuration Items (CIs) and their relationships. Provides filtering capabilities to manage data being displayed, allowing for configuration by the user to view in context to their role. Additional capabilities provide for the displaying of related tasks such as Incidents, Problems, Changes and Certification Tasks.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.keylines_bsm_map</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Keylines Business Service Maps</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.keylines_bsm_map/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.diagrammer,com.snc.keylines,com.glideapp.bsm_map2</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.keylines_bsm_map</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
